name: Disappointment Simulator
description:
Disappointment Simulator is a simulator which tests and evaluates how much of a disappointment you are. Try to make it into the Hall of Shame by dodging your everyday responsibilities and duties (colored red) while ruining your life with items that help increase your disappointment score (colored blue). Use your bullet time ability wisely in tight situations, and refill the bullet time gauge each time by collecting more and more stress relieving  objects. 

Controls:

Mouse: move cursor around

Space: activate bullet time ability

Personal high score: 440
